// import library import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import $ from 'jquery' function Navbar(props) { const acc = props.acc; const showManagementDropdown = () => { if($('.management-dropdown').hasClass('undisplay')) { $('.management-dropdown').removeClass('undisplay'); $('.management-dropdown').animate({ height: '200px', 'padding-top' : '35px', }, 400) const dropdown = document.getElementsByClassName("management-dropdown-holder"); document.addEventListener("click", (event) => { if (!dropdown.contains(event.target)) { // hide the dropdown $('.management-dropdown').animate({ height: '0', 'padding-top' : 0, }, 400, () => { $('.management-dropdown').addClass('undisplay'); }) } }); } else { $('.management-dropdown').animate({ height: '0', 'padding-top' : 0, }, 400, () => { $('.management-dropdown').addClass('undisplay'); }) } } return (
Do a test! Repository Vocabulary today

Hi {acc.dname}!

}
); } export default Navbar;
